WorkItem.ClosedComment: While strictly speaking we could make -v less verbose here this isn't something we're going to fix at this point in the schedule.
WorkItem.Description: When I type `tsc -v` or `tsc --version`, the help message (`tcs -h`) also gets printed as well as the version number. I'm using version 0.9.1.1.

Comments.Message: That's understandable. But do you have a concept of "deferral"? Even if it is not fixed in this release (or even the next) I should be fixed in some release, I think. It's not a comforting feeling to check the compiler version and see a bug :-)
